title: a few odds and sods T3 Doolan, Coombs auto etc

posts.post_title: a few odds and sods T3 Doolan, Coombs auto etc
posts.post_content:
T3 Doolan $90
Jack Coombs signed photo $80
Small original glass slide of the 1918 Indians with Speaker Roth and Coveleski. Plate is split in two. Comes with nice archival 8x10  $150
Lot.of two fed league autos $40
